publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1694.3 Mr Murray Tosh: Sustainable Developmentâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1694) in the name of Mr Sam Galbraith, leave out from ", and commends" to end and insert "and to passing on a decent inheritance to future generations of Scots; notes the progress reported to date in Working together for Scotland, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consult urgently to produce a transparent and effective implementation strategy for sustainability.
